body.name: Kbinter Cute Personal Mini Fan, Handheld & Portable USB Rechargeable 1 Speed USB Fans with Colorful LED Light Adjustable, for Indoor Or Outdoor Activities, Cute Mouse
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 23 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: ADORABLE MICKEY DESIGN - Cute Mickey mouse design in red, blue, pink and rose, pleasant colorful LED light, an eye-catching mini fan that you can hold in hand perfectly. It is your ideal choice for both indoor and outdoor activities. Enjoy your cool summer!

STRONG POWER SOURCE - This fan has a powerful built-in rechargeable lithium battery, which can be used for more than 3000 times. You can charge it with USB cable(included) by connecting it to laptop, phone charger, power bank, solar charger or car charger.

Multi Functions with 1 Button Operation- ①Press the "⚪" button once time to turn on the fans；Press the "⚪" button for the second time to turn on the colorful LED light; Press the "⚪" button for the third time to turn off the fans and colorful LED light.②5 fan blades, strong wind, wind distance up to 1m. ③Pure copper motor, which is durable and gives strong power performance.

COMPACT SIZE & PORTABLE - It is the same size as a 6-inch cellphone, taking up minimum space and portable enough to carry in a small bag or wear it on your finger with the fan finger holder (included), very practical for your daily use and travelling.

BEST GIFT FOR YOUR FRIENDS OR FAMILIES - Made of quality ABS material, safe and odor free. Beautiful LED light, Lovely color and kid-friendly design, best gift for your friends or families! Plus, 24-hour customer service and a 180-day warranty for any quality issue is provided for your better experience!
body.description: Specification: Input Voltage: 5V; Input Current: 0.5-1A; Output Voltage: 5-9V; Output Power: 1.5-2.5W Battery Capacity: 1200mAh Using Time: 1-2H Charging Time: 2-3H Instruction: Fully charge the product for the first time use. It can be be charged by power bank, computer and phone charger. Easy Control: Press the "⚪" button once time to turn on the fans. Press the "⚪" button for the second time to turn on the colorful LED light. Press the "⚪" button for the third time to turn off the fans and colorful LED light. Features: Small size, light weight The mini cute mouse fan is smaller than iPhone Plus Series and weighs 93g with the base, the cylindrical slender handle that conforms to hunman body design makes it easy to hold and more space- saving, you can put it into pocket or bag, very practical for your daily use and travelling. Premium motor, powerful wind The small portable fan is equipped with a very powerful motor, which can produce strong natural wind to keep you cool in places that don`t have air conditioner, you can feel cool 1m away from it. Battery powered, USB rechargeable The upgraded polymer lithium battery can support the mini fan run longer than the same capacity regular lithium battery, you can charge it through computer, power bank, car charger, regular socket, ect Creative design The colorful appearance looks cool and more match with summer, you will surely be the envy of everyone with this novel pocket fan. Environmental friendly Adopt environmental friendly ABS material, toxic free and safe, this portable fan is suitable for everyone including children. Warranty: 24 hour customer service. Please contact with our support team if you have any problem during using our product.

productInformation.value: #82,165 in Home & Kitchen (See Top 100 in Home & Kitchen) #123 in Personal Fans

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Idk what everyone else is on, but it shows one fan off and on to show the lights lol. I received the one fan I knew I'd receive and it's great. My son loves it. It comes with a cord and a stand for the fan. The color changing light is a nice touch.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Nice and powerful!! Can wait to use

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Brought the red one and blue one. The red one worked perfectly but the blue one only worked when plugged in. It never held a charge. So disappointing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Very misleading, the pictures show two fans, that's what I was expecting, instead, I received one fan, not what I wanted for my upcoming trip, I needed two, I don't know if it works yet because I just got it, im just so disappointed that I didn't get what I purchased...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Picture is misleading for sure. YOU ONLY GET ONE
reviews.reviewText: Cute little fan.... Thought you got two but you only get one. Works great for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Did not have two fans
reviews.reviewText: We only received one fan not two as pictures and description showed. The fan that did arrive was easy to use. However, I feel the battery dies quickly. I don’t think I would buy this again.
